limit.name: limit
limit.description: The maximum amount of results to return (max & default: 50).

starts-with.name: starts-with
starts-with.description: Only return words that start with this value (mutually exclusive with ends-with).

ends-with.name: ends-with
ends-with.description: Only return words that end with this value (mutually exclusive with starts-with).

errors.with_clause_exclusivity: The `starts-with` and `ends-with` options are mutually exclusive -- you can't use them both at the same time.
errors.not_found: ¡Lo sentimos, no podemos encontrar nada por tu consulta!

meta.name: adjective
meta.description: Responds with adjectives that describe your query.

word.name: word
word.description: The noun to search relavent adjectives for (eg: ocean).

meta.name: definition
meta.description: Responds with the definition of your query from Merriam Webster.

word.name: word
word.description: The word to search a definition for (eg: ocean).

meta.name: invite
meta.description: Returns an invite link to add Thoth to your server.

invite.success: Want to add Thoth to your server? [Click here]({{link}})!

meta.name: match-word
meta.description: Responds with words that match the word you provide (eg: a??le -> apple, d??? -> date).

word.name: word
word.description: The word to find matches for (example: a??le).

meta.name: noun
meta.description: Responds with nouns that are often described by your query.

word.name: word
word.description: TThe adjective to search relevant nouns for (eg: yellow).

meta.name: ping
meta.description: Ensures the bot is responding to commands.

pongs: What can I do ya' for?
What's with you puny humans and the constant desire to bother me?
Out of everyone here, you chose to bother me?
So *this* is the meaning of life?
Can we just get this over with?? I have stuff to do.
Do it again. I dare you.

meta.name: rhyme
meta.description: Responds with words that rhyme with your query.

word.name: word
word.description: The word to search rhymes for (eg: dime).

meta.name: similar-meaning
meta.description: Response with words that have a similar meaning to your query.

word.name: word
word.description: The word to search similar words for (eg: transgressions).

similar-meaning.generic_success:
I found `{{found_count}}` words that are similar to `{{word}}`{{rest}}: 

{{words}}
similar-meaning.starts_with_success:
I found `{{found_count}}` words that are similar to `{{word}}` and start with `{{starts_with}}`: 

{{words}}
similar-meaning.ends_with_success:
I found `{{found_count}}` words that are similar to `{{word}}` and end with `{{ends_with}}`: 

{{words}}

meta.name: similar-spelling
meta.description: Responds with words that have a similar spelling to your query.

word.name: word
word.description: The word to search similar words for (eg: agile).

similar-spelling.success:
I found `{{found_count}}` words that're similarly spelled to `{{word}}`: 

{{words}}

meta.name: sounds-like
meta.description: Responds with words that sound like your query.

word.name: word
word.description: The word to search similarly sounding words for (eg: agile).

sounds-like.success:
I found `{{found_count}}` words that sound like `{{word}}`: 

{{words}}

meta.name: that-follow
meta.description: Responds with words that could logically follow query.

word.name: word
word.description: The word to search following words for (eg: open).

that-follow.generic_success:
I found `{{found_count}}` words that logically follow `{{word}}`: 

{{words}}
that-follow.starts_with_success:
I found `{{found_count}}` words that logically follow `{{word}}` that start with `{{starts_with}}`: 

{{words}}
that-follow.ends_with_success:
I found `{{found_count}}` words that logically follow `{{word}}` that end with `{{ends_with}}`: 

{{words}}

meta.name: word-of-the-day
meta.description: Responds with the word of the day from Merriam Webster.
